text:
snow in Edmonton,
don't forget your coat and scarf,
or it will be cold

Carly Rae Jepsen,
a musucian from BC,
have you heard her work?

Sun is still shining,
is it time for sunscreen yet?
let's go to the beach

Chat AI is cool,
Robot are intelligent,
but also scary

Legend of Zelda,
Link is the main character
Not Princess Zelda
